title: All Ball - Joe Lunardi on the Birth of Bracketology, 2021 Field
itunes:title: All Ball - Joe Lunardi on the Birth of Bracketology, 2021 Field
description:
In this episode, Doug is joined by famed Bracketologist Joe Lunardi to discuss his new book on the NCAA Tourney, his path from publishing an obscure print tournament guide to becoming the preeminent TV bracket analyst in the country, and the 2021 tourney field. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
